Texts.Chs: 制作一个^green;灯笼杆^reset; 在 ^orange;采集工作台^reset;可以找到。然后返回 ^green;Welchie^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Lantern Stick^reset; at the ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在你不用拿手电筒瞎照了，把它带在身上然后旅行！而且，我在仓库找到一些^orange;植物纤维^reset;。你不拿去？
Texts.Eng: Now you'll be able to slap that on your head and travel without needing to hold a flashlight! Also, I found some ^orange;Plant Fibre^reset; in storage. Why don't you take it?

Texts.Chs: 有时，黑暗会成为可怕的障碍。 我给你的 ^orange;油^reset; 就是从那里来的: 你可以制作一个 ^orange;灯笼杆^reset;来保护眼睛.......去 ^orange;采集工作台^reset;制作. ^green;研究^reset; 一哈^orange;农业^reset; 来学习制作
Texts.Eng: Sometimes, the darkness can prove a horrible hindrance. That's where tha ^orange;Oil^reset; I got ya ter make comes in: You can craft a ^orange;Lantern Stick^reset; to see in the dark at a ^orange;Foraging Station^reset;. ^green;Research^reset; into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; to learn how.
